name: Cyclopropane

energies.comment: Ring strain weakens bonds. 60째 angles (vs ideal 109.5째) create stress. Bonds are ~115 kJ/mol weaker than relaxed C-C bonds. Negative violation expected.
energies.source: Calculated from experimental ring strain energy

reference_energies.comment: Standard bond energies (kJ/mol) for naive calculation

notes: Cyclopropane is THE canonical example of ring strain
This geometric constraint creates correlation - bonds cannot relax independently
Bonds are under stress, easier to break (lower bond energy)
Negative violation: actual < naive (opposite of benzene)
